articles.title: Apple Preparing Four New 2nm Chipsets In 2026, With At Least Two Of Them Adopting An Advanced Packaging Technology - Wccftech
articles.description: The 2nm technology being prepared by TSMC is not just going to be used for Apple’s iPhone 18 chips, but for other products too, which have been highlighted in the latest report
articles.content: As TSMC prepares for 2nm wafer production in the final quarter of this year, Apple has reportedly seized nearly half of the initial capacity, and not just because the company will leverage it for the… [+2257 chars]
